job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on supporting and improving existing AI systems rather than developing new AI models or applications. While it involves interacting with AI and providing feedback for fine-tuning, the core responsibilities are centered around customer support and ticket resolution, with AI acting as an augmentation tool. This aligns with the 'Ambiguous' profile's definition of primarily focusing on the USE of AI tools to enhance productivity, rather than core AI engineering or development.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions' directly relates to adapting or improving existing AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'improving the AI system' implies making changes or enhancements to the AI model or its underlying logic.
The phrase 'Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies' involves building and evaluating new technical solutions, which falls under software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short' indicates understanding the business context of customer support and identifying limitations in AI solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support' shows an understanding of how to combine different elements to meet business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month
